article_title: Susan Sarandon Admits to Attending 'Almost All' Award Shows Stoned
article_text: Celebrities React to Prince's Death News just broke about Prince’s sudden death, and celebrities are already mourning him on social media.

article_metadata.description: It turns out Susan Sarandon is a bit of a pothead! She just admitted to Bravo's Andy Cohen that she's attended quite a few Hollywood events stoned! Watch: Bravo TV
